Title: Argentina’s Enarsa takes fewer LNG cargoes in May and June than purchased
Description: Argentina’s state-owned energy firm Enarsa has received three LNG cargoes fewer than it purchased for May and June, with a mild start to the southern hemisphere winter season probably weighing on the country’s gas demand.
Author: CK

Title: Mercuria secures export credit loan to supply more gas and LNG to Italy
Description: Mercuria Energy Trading has secured a EUR 500 million ($547.2 million) loan from Italy’s export credit agency SACE to supply more gas and LNG to Italy, supporting Italy’s industrial needs and the wider European gas market.
Author: CK
